data.text: The time came for the Fine Motion's second summer training.
data.processed: <story>The time came for the Fine Motion's second summer training.

data.text:
OK, Fine! Let's go, Fine~~! 
Gooooo!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>OK, Fine! Let's go, Fine~~! 
<story>Gooooo!

data.text:
Of course I am! 
After all――
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Of course I am! 
<story>After all――

data.text:
This is the year where I'm going to eat ramen from every last 
store on this beach!
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Wait, that's what you're focused on!?

data.processed:
<story>This is the year where I'm going to eat ramen from every last 
<story>store on this beach!

data.text:
Well, it's not good for my health if I eat nothing but ramen all 
the time, right?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Well, it's not good for my health if I eat nothing but ramen all 
<story>the time, right?

data.text:
So I couldn't get to every place last year... 
And this year, we have a race scheduled in the middle of camp, 
don't we?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>So I couldn't get to every place last year... 
<story>And this year, we have a race scheduled in the middle of camp, 
<story>don't we?

data.text:
There's a lot keeping me from getting to every ramen place. 
But I've got a plan!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>There's a lot keeping me from getting to every ramen place. 
<story>But I've got a plan!

data.text:
And the key phrase for that plan... 
"Hey, let me try a bite♪"!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>And the key phrase for that plan... 
<story>"Hey, let me try a bite♪"!

data.text:
It's a strategy I picked up at the academy! 
If I share with others, I can get a little taste of everything!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>It's a strategy I picked up at the academy! 
<story>If I share with others, I can get a little taste of everything!

data.text: Now that I've explained things, I'm looking forward to your help♪
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Sure, so long as you're focused on training.
choices.processed: <size=38>Sure, so long as you're focused on training.</size>

choices.text: Sure, so long as you're focused on training.
choices.processed: <size=38>Sure, so long as you're focused on training.</size>

data.processed: <story>Now that I've explained things, I'm looking forward to your help♪

data.text:
Of course I will! That should go without saying! 
......Oh.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Of course I will! That should go without saying! 
<story>......Oh.

data.text: ......Shakur.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>......Shakur.

data.text: Sigh...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Sigh...

data.text: So you're not hesitating anymore, huh.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>So you're not hesitating anymore, huh.

data.text:
You'll play your role. You're going to follow that script, down to 
the letter.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You'll play your role. You're going to follow that script, down to 
<story>the letter.

data.text:
Mmhm. I'm sorry. 
I can't be your god.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Mmhm. I'm sorry. 
<story>I can't be your god.

data.text:
But I'll play my role and put on an amazing show. 
I'll run so well, even your heart will skip a beat.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>But I'll play my role and put on an amazing show. 
<story>I'll run so well, even your heart will skip a beat.

data.text:
So I can't be your god... 
But would you let me be your angel?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>So I can't be your god... 
<story>But would you let me be your angel?

data.text: ......Dumbass.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>......Dumbass.

data.text:
I don't need a god or an angel. 
If you're not gonna do it...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I don't need a god or an angel. 
<story>If you're not gonna do it...

data.text: ...then I'll just do it myself.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...then I'll just do it myself.

data.text:
In the end I never learned the reason why Air Shakur clung so 
tightly to Fine Motion... But――

choices.text: It looks like she's made up her mind.
It looks like she's made up her mind.

data.processed:
<story>In the end I never learned the reason why Air Shakur clung so 
<story>tightly to Fine Motion... But――

data.text:
Yes. 
She's going to face that wall blocking her way, head-on.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Yes. 
<story>She's going to face that wall blocking her way, head-on.

data.text: I've got to give it my all and get stronger, too!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>I've got to give it my all and get stronger, too!
